1491520.name: Tales of the Realm: Arisen
1491520.description:
Enter the kingdom of Mythuras: a proud and mighty human kingdom, and face the greatest threat that the land has yet to see. The dead themselves have arisen.

EXPLORE AND EXPERIENCE THE KINGDOM

Every area of Mythuras is open for exploration. Speak with citizens, inspect items and explore hidden areas to learn the story of the kingdom that you fight for.
There are no right path to saving Mythuras - you must pick the one you deem the safest, fastest or most empowering.

CHOOSE YOUR STYLE OF COMBAT

Whether you are a vicious warrior wielding a sword and plate armour, a swift archer who excels in ranged combat or even a great sorcerer with great intellect, you can always get stronger. Buy new weapons and protection from the merchants scattered across the land, or search for them yourself in the darkest corners of the forests.

WORK TOWARD YOUR GOAL

With so many paths to take and so many ways to improve, play through the undead crisis over again, and find the best possible way to save Mythuras. Whether it makes you stronger, faster or perhaps most knowledgable.
